channel.title: I Need Help With This("In need of transformation")
channel.description:
I need to transform a file downloader (made in java) into a gui so i can type the thing i want to download and then another one instead of having to click run.bat everytime heres my run.bat [Code]@echo off set /P f=File To Download off the web(no http://): java FileDownloader http://%f% Pause[/Code] So It Gets The File From The Web... I need a gui for this please
(Mod Taharok)Please Help me (anyone)Try To Help!
heres the .java thing in the attachment
